alert.note: Alert for Kingfisher; Logan; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 12:58AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Kingfisher, northern Oklahoma and southern Logan Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1258 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Meridian to 4 miles west of Cashion. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Edmond, Guthrie, Luther, Cashion, Cedar Valley, Arcadia, Meridian, Navina, Seward, and Downtown Edmond. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 142 and 157. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
